name: Vegetable Korma
description: This vegetable korma makes the perfect weeknight dinner. It's packed with flavor, loaded with fresh vegetables, entirely vegan, and ready in less than 30 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Before you start with this recipe: soak the cashews for 1 hour in boiling water from the tea kettle.
recipeInstructions.name: Before you start with this recipe: soak the cashews for 1 hour in boiling water from the tea kettle.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the carrots into half moons, the cauliflower into small florets, and the potatoes into medium-sized cubes. Cook the potatoes for 5 minutes in boiling water. Then add the remaining vegetables and cook them for another 5 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the carrots into half moons, the cauliflower into small florets, and the potatoes into medium-sized cubes. Cook the potatoes for 5 minutes in boiling water. Then add the remaining vegetables and cook them for another 5 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the onion, the garlic, and the ginger.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the onion, the garlic, and the ginger.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat some oil and sauté the onion for 3 minutes until translucent. Then add the garlic and the ginger and cook for 2 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat some oil and sauté the onion for 3 minutes until translucent. Then add the garlic and the ginger and cook for 2 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Next, add the spices and cook for another minute until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Next, add the spices and cook for another minute until fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the onion mixture into a food processor or high speed blender along with the coconut milk, the canned diced tomatoes, and the cashews.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the onion mixture into a food processor or high speed blender along with the coconut milk, the canned diced tomatoes, and the cashews.

recipeInstructions.text: Process until smooth. Pour the sauce into a pan and heat on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Process until smooth. Pour the sauce into a pan and heat on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the cooked vegetables. Add the vegetables to the sauce and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the cooked vegetables. Add the vegetables to the sauce and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with freshly chopped cilantro and red pepper flakes and serve over rice or with naan bread. Enjoy!
